line: Ragged Dick OR, STREET LIFE IN NEW YORK WITH THE BOOT BLACKS.

It may seem a little unnecessary to some of my readers to make this explanation; but they must remember that pride and “big feeling” are confined to no age or class, but may be found in boys as well as men, and in boot blacks as well as those of a higher rank.
